text: Patrik Šorm (born 21 November 1993) is a Czech sprinter specialising in the 400 metres. He won the bronze medal in the 4 × 400 metres relay at the 2015 European Indoor Championships. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing the |- |2011 |European Junior Championships |Tallinn, Estonia |5th |4 × 400 m relay |3:10.20 |- |2013 |European U23 Championships |Tampere, Finland |6th |4 × 400 m relay |3:05.82 |- |rowspan=2|2014 |rowspan=2|European Championships |rowspan=2|Zürich, Switzerland |26th (h) |400 m |46.35 |- |8th |4 × 400 m relay |3:04.56 |- |rowspan=4|2015 |rowspan=2|European Indoor Championships |rowspan=2|Prague, Czech Republic |12th (sf) |400 m |47.70 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4 × 400 m relay |3:04.09 |- |rowspan=2|European U23 Championships |rowspan=2|Tallinn, Estonia |6th |400 m |46.60 |- |4th |4 × 400 m relay |3:07.27 |- |2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |4th |4 × 400 m relay |3:03.86 |- |rowspan=3|2017 |rowspan=2|European Indoor Championships |rowspan=2|Belgrade, Serbia |12th (h) |400 m |47.50 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4 × 400 m relay |3:08.60 |- |IAAF World Relays |Nassau, Bahamas |4th (B) |4 × 400 m relay |3:08.17 |- |rowspan=4|2018 |rowspan=2|World Indoor Championships |rowspan=2|Birmingham, United Kingdom |13th (sf) |400 m |47.04 |- |5th |4 × 400 m relay |3:04.87 |- |rowspan=2|European Championships |rowspan=2|Berlin, Germany |18th (h) |400 m |46.52 |- |7th |4 × 400 m relay |3:03.00 |- |2019 |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |11th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:02.97 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *400 metres – 46.13 (Ostrava 2014) Indoor *200 metres – 21.15(Prague 2018) *400 metres – 46.49 (Prague 2015) ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male sprinters Category:European Games competitors for the Czech Republic Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in athletics Category:European Games silver medalists for the Czech Republic Category:Czech Athletics Championships winners
title: Patrik Šorm
